words.source: H4390 wayyiqtol 3ms Niphal of מָלֵא 'to fill, be full'; KJV 'were fulfilled', ESV 'passed', NASB 'passed'
H7651 num.ms constr. שֶׁבַע 'seven'; KJV 'seven', ESV 'seven', NASB 'seven'
H3117 n.mp יוֹם 'day'; KJV 'days', ESV 'full days', NASB 'days'
H310 prep. אַחֲרֵי 'after, behind'; KJV 'after that', ESV 'after', NASB 'after'
H5221 Hiphil inf. constr. of נָכָה 'to strike'; KJV 'had smitten', ESV 'had struck', NASB 'struck'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English versions
H2975 art. + n.ms יְאֹר 'Nile, river'; KJV 'the river', ESV 'the Nile', NASB 'the Nile'
